text: A monokaryon is a fungal mycelium or hypha in which each cell contains a single nucleusA Dictionary of Plant Sciences | 1998 | MICHAEL ALLABY. It also refers to a mononuclear spore or cell of a fungus that produces a dikaryon in its life cycle.Monokaryon Merriam-Webster dictionary ==See also== *Dikaryon ==References== Category:Mycology
title: Monokaryon
